channel.title: powershell on Stuart Blackler's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in powershell on Stuart Blackler's Blog

item.title: Up And Running With Git And Powershell
item.description: We've all experienced a time where we use our pc's for a prolonged period of time, accumulating a ton of crap along the way as we try out various technologies and fads. After a while, the pc begins to do funny things like crash for no apparent reason. This week, I needed to rebuild my dev machine and decided to change from Atlassian's Source Tree over to Powershell and raw git.

item.title: 3 Easy Steps To Configuring Azure With Powershell
item.description: Recently, I had to automate some tasks in Azure. This is the easiest way I could get started.
